Future of Media

The Future of Computer Games

The project course “Future of Media” is a graduate-level course for master students at The Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) that study Media Technology and Media Management.

The course is held every year with different themes and this year’s theme is the “Future of Computer Games”. How can the computer games of the future look like and how can they be experienced in the future?

We are going to investigate ideas on topics such as gaming culture, human senses and technologies that will be used in the future. This will then be presented during an event the 16th of December where all project groups will showcase their findings. Representatives from the industry and around 200 students from different years and chapters will be invited.
